item.title: Intro and To Do

item.title: Linear Algebra
item.description: Introduction This will serve as a small refresher about some linear algebra topics that will be useful later. Vectors A vector, as we know, is a collection of elements that has a direction and a magnitude. The most common case for this is a vector in $\mathbb{R}^n$, the n-dimensional real...
